org.alicebot.ab

Class AIMLProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alicebot.ab.AIMLProcessor

  • public class AIMLProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    The core AIML parser and interpreter. Implements the AIML 2.0 specification as described in AIML 2.0 Working Draft document https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wNT25hJRyupcG51aO89UcQEiG-HkXRXusukADpFnDs4/pub

      static int trace_count

                                              ParseState ps,
                                              java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreAttributes)
        evaluate the contents of an AIML tag. calls recursEval on child tags.
        Parameters:
        node - the current parse node.
        ps - the current parse state.
        ignoreAttributes - tag names to ignore when evaluating the tag.
        Returns:
        the result of evaluating the tag contents.

      • genericXML

        public static java.lang.String genericXML(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                          ParseState ps)
        pass thru generic XML (non-AIML tags, such as HTML) as unevaluated XML
        Parameters:
        node - current parse node
        ps - current parse state
        Returns:
        unevaluated generic XML string

      • unevaluatedXML

        private static java.lang.String unevaluatedXML(java.lang.String result,
                                               org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                               ParseState ps)
        return a string of unevaluated XML. When the AIML parser encounters an unrecognized XML tag, it simply passes through the tag in XML form. For example, if the response contains HTML markup, the HTML is passed to the requesting process. However if that markup contains AIML tags, those tags are evaluated and the parser builds the result.
        Parameters:
        result - the tag contents.
        node - current parse node.
        ps - current parse state.
        Returns:
        the unevaluated XML string

        Parameters:

        ps - current parse state.
        Returns:

      • getAttributeOrTagValue

        private static java.lang.String getAttributeOrTagValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                                       ParseState ps,
                                                       java.lang.String attributeName)
        in AIML 2.0, an attribute value can be specified by either an XML attribute value or a subtag of the same name. This function tries to read the value from the XML attribute first, then tries to look for the subtag.
        Parameters:
        node - current parse node.
        ps - current parse state.
        attributeName - the name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the attribute value.

                                      ParseState ps)
        access external web service for response implements and its attribute variations.
        Parameters:
        node - current XML parse node
        ps - AIML parse state
        Returns:
        response from remote service or string indicating failure.

      • system

        private static java.lang.String system(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                       ParseState ps)
        implements <system> tag. Evaluate the contents, and try to execute the result as a command in the underlying OS shell. Read back and return the result of this command. The timeout parameter allows the botmaster to set a timeout in ms, so that the command returns eventually.
        Parameters:
        node - current XML parse node
        ps - AIML parse state
        Returns:
        the result of executing the system command or a string indicating the command failed.

      • think

        private static java.lang.String think(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                      ParseState ps)
        implements <think> tag Evaluate the tag contents but return a blank. "Think but don't speak."
        Parameters:
        node - current XML parse node
        ps - AIML parse state
        Returns:
        a blank empty string

        private static java.lang.String explode(org.w3c.dom.Node node,

        Transform a string of words (separtaed by spaces) into a string of individual characters (separated by spaces). Explode "ABC DEF" = "A B C D E F".

        Returns:
        exploded string

      • evalTagForLoop

        public static boolean evalTagForLoop(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        check to see if a result contains a <loop/> tag.
        Parameters:
        node - current XML parse node
        Returns:
        true or false

      • recursEval

        private static java.lang.String recursEval(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                           ParseState ps)
        Recursively descend the XML DOM tree, evaluating AIML and building a response.
        Parameters:
        node - current XML parse node
        ps - AIML parse state

                                             ParseState ps)
